channel.title: Shepherdnick.co.uk - GrapeVine - Version 2.1
channel.description: It's a shame we have to die my dear, cos no-one's getting out of here alive.

item.title: :: 21/07/05 - Lots of work with very little play
item.description: Not a lot I've done since the last blog to be really honest with you. Like I complained about in the last blog ...

item.title: :: 27/07/05 - Drinking when I shouldn't be
item.description:
:: 25/07/05 - Drinking when I shouldn't be
Well not exactly drinking when I shouldn't be, but I'll talk about that later on. Like I said in the last blog, my sister had been reading the latest Harry Potter, so...

item.title: :: 31/07/05 - Spending very little, yet listening to very much
item.description:
:: 31/07/05 - Spending very little, yet listening to very much
What do I mean by that then, I hear you ask? Well I was wondering how much an MP3 player would set me back...

item.title: :: 03/08/05 - I think it's time for another blog!
item.description:
:: 03/08/05 - I think it's time for another blog!
Yeah, not really much to say, but a couple of things to show. More like a show and tell online really. LOL. God I'm good. Well been in work for the majority of the week and it makes me so fatigued that I can't even look at revision when I come home from work most of the time. And someone pressurised me into working on Sunday...
